text: The Husband Hunter is a 1920 American comedy-drama film directed by Howard M. Mitchell starring Eileen Percy and Emory Johnson. Note that there was also a British film in 1920 with the same name. ==Cast== :{| ! style="width: 180px; text-align: left;" | Actor ! style="width: 230px; text-align: left;" | Role |- style="text-align: left;" |Eileen Percy||Myra Hastings |- |Emory Johnson||Kent Whitney |- |Jane Miller||Lilah Elkins |- |Evans Kirk||Bob Harkness |- |Edward McWade||Charles Mack |- |John Steppling||Kelly |- |Harry Dunkinson||Arthur Elkins |- |} ==Gallery== File:The Husband Hunter (1920) - 2.jpg File:The Husband Hunter (1920) - 3.jpg File:The Husband Hunter (1920) - 5.jpg File:The Husband Hunter (1920) - 4.jpg File:The Husband Hunter (1920) - 1.jpg ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1920 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:English-language films Category:Silent films Category:Associated Exhibitors films Category:Fox Film films
